name: The Backrooms: 2D
description:
This game was made to run on Windows

I am planning for this game to get future updates

This game is an adaptation of a horror concept called The Backrooms. In this game you wander around different levels of The Backrooms collecting items and avoiding various entities. You may encounter other people and obstacles on your journey!

The Backrooms is an urban legend and creepy pasta describing an endless maze of randomly generated office rooms and other environments. It is characterized by the smell of moist carpet, walls with a monochromatic tone of yellow, and buzzing fluorescent lights.

Levels Featured:

Level Tutorial - Manila
Level 0 - The Lobby
Level 1 - The Habitable Zone
Level 2 - Pipe Dreams
Level 4 - The Abandoned Office
Level 6 - Lights Out 

More Content to come

Backrooms Wiki - https://backrooms.fandom.com/wiki/Backrooms_Wiki

This game was made with GameMaker 2

My Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgs4CKb3pilrn-OhiXvMyww
